00012 CExpire::CExpire(const char*  ProgName,const char* KeyName,UINT Num,UINT ExpireType)
00013 {       
00014         m_first=true;
00015         m_ExpireType=ExpireType;
00016         m_count=Num;
00017         CreateProgKey(ProgName,KeyName);
00018         UINT rcount;    
00019         GetSystemDirectory(m_systemfolder,MAX_PATH);
00020         strcpy(m_filename,m_systemfolder);
00021         if(m_filename[strlen(m_filename)-1]!='\\')
00022                 strcat(m_filename,"\\");        
00023         strcat(m_filename,KeyName);
00024         strcat(m_filename,".dll");
00025         m_filefound=LocateFile();
00026         switch (m_ExpireType)
00027         {
00028         case TYPERUNS:          
00029                 if(GetRunCount(rcount))
00030                 {
00031                         if(!m_filefound)
00032                         {                       
00033                                 SetRunCount();
00034                                 m_first=false;
00035                                 CreateProtectFile();
00036                         }
00037                 }
00038                         
00039                 else
00040                 {               
00041                         if(rcount>0 && rcount<=m_count)                                                 
00042                         {
00043                                 SetRunCount(rcount-1);
00044                                 m_first=false;
00045                         }               
00046                 }
00047                 break;
00048         case TYPEDAYS:
00049                 
00050                 if(GetDayCount(rcount))
00051                 {
00052                         if(!m_filefound)
00053                         {                       
00054                                 SetDayCount();
00055                                 m_first=false;
00056                                 CreateProtectFile();
00057                         }
00058                 }
00059                         
00060                 else
00061                 {       
00062                         
00063                         if(rcount>0 && rcount<=m_count)                                                 
00064                         {                               
00065                                 m_first=false;
00066                         }               
00067                 }
00068 
00069                 break;
00070         }
00071 
00072 
00073 }

00075 CExpire::~CExpire()
00076 {
00077         RegCloseKey(m_hKey);

00080 bool CExpire::CreateProgKey(const char*  ProgName, const char* KeyName)
00081 {
00082         char *SubKey = new char [strlen(ProgName) +strlen(KeyName)+300];
00083         strcpy(SubKey,"CLSID\\");
00084         strcat(SubKey,ProgName);
00085         strcat(SubKey,"\\");
00086         strcat(SubKey,KeyName);
00087         HKEY hKey;
00088         DWORD dwDisposition;
00089         LONG ret;
00090         ret=RegCreateKeyEx(HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT,SubKey,0,"",REG_OPTION_NON_VOLATILE,
00091                 KEY_ALL_ACCESS,NULL,&hKey,&dwDisposition);
00092         m_hKey=hKey;
00093         delete SubKey;
00094         if(ret==ERROR_SUCCESS)
00095                 return false;
00096         else
00097                 return true;
00098 }

00100 bool CExpire::GetRunCount(UINT& count)
00101 {
00102         LONG ret;
00103         char data[128];
00104         DWORD size=sizeof data;
00105         ret=RegQueryValueEx(m_hKey,"windll",0,NULL,(BYTE*)data,&size);
00106         if(ret==ERROR_SUCCESS)
00107         {
00108                 DeObfuscate(data,count);
00109                 
00110                 return false;
00111         }
00112         else
00113                 return true;
00114 }

00116 bool CExpire::SetRunCount()
00117 {
00118         LONG ret;
00119         char str[128];  
00120         Obfuscate(m_count-1,str);
00121         DWORD size=strlen(str)+1;
00122         ret=RegSetValueEx(m_hKey,"windll",0,REG_SZ,(BYTE*)str,size);
00123         if(ret==ERROR_SUCCESS)
00124                 return false;
00125         else
00126                 return true;

00143 bool CExpire::Obfuscate(UINT num, char *str)
00144 {       
00145         char tmpstr[128];
00146         srand((unsigned int)time(NULL));
00147         UINT seed1,seed2,seed3;
00148         seed1=rand();
00149         seed2=rand();
00150         seed3=abs((int)(seed1-seed2));
00151         sprintf(tmpstr,"%d.%d.%d",seed1,num+seed3,seed2);
00152         strcpy(str,tmpstr);
00153         return false;
00154 }
00155 
00156 bool CExpire::DeObfuscate(char *str, UINT &num)
00157 {
00158         char tmpstr[128];
00159         strcpy(tmpstr,str);
00160         UINT seed1,seed2,seed3;
00161         char *p1=strchr(tmpstr,'.');    
00162         if(!p1)
00163         {
00164                 return true;
00165         }
00166         *p1=0;
00167         seed1=atoi(tmpstr);
00168         p1++;
00169         char *p2=strchr(p1,'.');
00170         if(!p2)
00171         {
00172                 return true;
00173         }
00174         *p2=0;
00175         int tmpNum=atoi(p1);
00176         p2++;
00177         seed2=atoi(p2);
00178         seed3=abs((int)(seed1-seed2));
00179         num=tmpNum-seed3;
00180         return false;
00181 }

00183 bool CExpire::SetDayCount()
00184 {
00185         LONG ret;
00186         char str[128];  
00187         UINT TodaySecs=time(NULL);
00188         TodaySecs+=(m_count)*24*3600;   
00189         Obfuscate(TodaySecs,str);
00190         DWORD size=strlen(str)+1;
00191         ret=RegSetValueEx(m_hKey,"windll",0,REG_SZ,(BYTE*)str,size);
00192         if(ret==ERROR_SUCCESS)
00193                 return false;
00194         else
00195                 return true;
00196 }

00198 
00199 bool CExpire::GetDayCount(UINT& count)
00200 {
00201         LONG ret;
00202         char data[128];
00203         DWORD size=sizeof data;
00204         ret=RegQueryValueEx(m_hKey,"windll",0,NULL,(BYTE*)data,&size);
00205         if(ret==ERROR_SUCCESS)
00206         {
00207                 DeObfuscate(data,count);
00208                 UINT TodaySecs=time(NULL);              
00209                 UINT tmpcount=count;
00210                 count=(count-TodaySecs)/(24*3600);
00211                 if((tmpcount-TodaySecs)%(24*3600))
00212                         count++;
00213                 return false;
00214         }
00215         else
00216                 return true;
00217 }

00219 bool CExpire::HasExpired()
00220 {
00221         if(m_first)
00222                 RegDeleteValue(m_hKey,"windll");
00223         return m_first;
00224 }

00226 bool CExpire::LocateFile()
00227 {
00228 
00229         WIN32_FIND_DATA tmpWIN32_FIND_DATA;
00230         HANDLE hFile=FindFirstFile(m_filename,&tmpWIN32_FIND_DATA);
00231         if (hFile==INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00232                 return false;
00233         else
00234         {
00235                 
00236                 FindClose(hFile);
00237                 return true;
00238         }
00239 }

00241 bool CExpire::CreateProtectFile()
00242 {
00243         char buff[32];
00244         buff[31]=0;
00245         bool ret=false;
00246         FILE* fp=fopen(m_filename,"w");
00247         fprintf(fp,buff);
00248         fclose(fp);
00249         return ret;
00250 }
